DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Moxidex ophthalmic solution safe effective treat marginal corneal infiltrates .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study Moxidex Ophthalmic Solution Treatment Marginal Corneal Infiltrates
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis marginal corneal infiltrates size equal le 1.5mm diameter , mild , moderate severe bulbar conjunctival injection least one eye . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Age related . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
